title: Ticket #5046: gridmanager/blahp should perform bulk queries against batch backend
description:
Currently, the blahp queries jobs one-at-a-time for their status.

This is very inefficient (each job query is going to spawn at least one process - usually tens). It's also hard on the batch systems - which are often optimized for bulk queries.

We should add a new status command that retrieves all jobs for the given user. Any of the resulting jobs known to the gridmanager ought to have their status updated.
